post:
Hello, hello!

Haris from PieLayer here and today I would like to share with you end year specials which we prepared.

Before I get started with the specials I would like to wish to all members and staff here happy New Year, to reflect back on 2018 and make 2019 even better than previous one.

PS. Feel free to suggest any other specs and I will see what we can do! :)
